items.sentence: Tom is waiting for some of his friends to join him.
Tom is upstairs, screaming at Mary for some reason.
Tom is too much of a coward to go there by himself.
Tom has been hanging out with a woman half his age.
Tom can't speak French, but all of his friends can.
I need some cardboard boxes to pack my possessions.
I want to discuss a very important matter with you.
I ran outside and the door locked itself behind me.
I can only work on Fridays, Saturdays, and Sundays.
I wasn't able to attend the meeting due to illness.
